LanguageData.RS.AlreadyHasMaxThrallAmount: Already has maximum thrall amount allowed.
LanguageData.RS.MessageLovethrallCapacityChanged: {PAWN_nameDef}'s lovethrall capacity has increased from {OLD} to {NEW}.
LanguageData.RS.LovethrallCapacityDesc: text.todo.\n\nLovethrall capacity can be increased using lovethrall capacity serums. These serums can be purchased from traders.
LanguageData.RS.LoveThrallsDesc: People with the psychic enthralling gene are able to manipulate others minds and turn them into willing and loyal servants. This is permanent until either the carrier of the gene, or the enthralled person dies.
